bibl.title: P. Sta. Xyla. The Byzantine Papyri of the Greek Papyrological Society. Volume 1.
bibl.seg: MANDILARAS Basil G. (edited by), P. Sta. Xyla. The Byzantine Papyri of the Greek Papyrological Society. Volume 1.
Athens, The Greek Papyrological Society, 1993, 8°, 204 pp., 30 pll. coul. ISBN 960-85019-3-8.

C.R. par Perséphone Antoniou, Scriptorium 48 (1994) p. 170*. - Alain Blanchard, REG 107 (1994) p. 728. - I.F. Fikhman, SCI 13 (1994) pp. 210-215. - Jean Gascou, ChrEg 69 (1994) No. 137, pp. 177-182. - Panayotis K. Georgountzos, Platôn 46 (1994) 91/92, pp. 230-232. - Brian C. McGing, CR N.S., 46 (1996) pp. 393-394. - Bernhard Palme, Tyche 11 (1996) pp. 283-285.
